verses.text: And in that day thou shalt say, O \sc Lord\sc*, I will praise thee: though thou wast angry with me, Thine anger is turned away, and thou comfortedst me.
Behold, God \add is\add* my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid: For the \sc Lord\sc* JEHOVAH \add is\add* my strength and \add my\add* song; He also is become my salvation.
Therefore with joy shall ye draw water out of the wells of salvation.
And in that day shall ye say, Praise the \sc Lord\sc*, call upon his name, Declare his doings among the people, Make mention that his name \add is\add* exalted.
Sing unto the \sc Lord\sc*; for he hath done excellent things: This \add is\add* known in all the earth.
Cry out and shout, thou inhabitant of Zion: For great \add is\add* the Holy One of Israel in the midst of thee.
